entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:04 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning late this morning and ending this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
